parameters.name: CallbackUrl
parameters.description: The callback URL. For more information about the callback content, see CreateEventSub.

parameters.name: ChannelId
parameters.description:
The channel ID. You can call the [ListEventSub](~~2848210~~) operation to query the channel ID.

> 

*   This parameter is required if you specify the Users.N parameter.

*   If you set this parameter to \* or do not specify this parameter, all channels are subscribed to.

*   You can create up to 20 subscriptions for each application ID.

parameters.name: Events
parameters.description: The type of the events to which you want to subscribe.

parameters.name: SubscribeId
parameters.description: The subscription ID. You can obtain the ID from the response to the [CreateEventSub](~~2848209~~) operation.

parameters.name: Users
parameters.description: The user whose events you want to subscribe to.
